Yeah, I paided for Darwinia and then it just downloaded

the way it works with Vendetta is that it adds access to a private PPA to your LP account, adds the PPA to your sources.list, and then downloads the package. It's all transparent so that you just see it downloading stuff.
if you don't have any PPA subscriptions on the LP account you put into Software Center, I guess Darwinia is different, and I'm not about to drop $10 to check that ;)
